mapper.select: select a.*,a.edate from ( select count(tid) sl,b.*,a.edate from ( select a.s_htext,a.tid,a.s_name,a.s_id,max(edate) edate from ( select s_htext,a.s_tid tid,s_name,a.s_id,a.s_date edate from HuiFu a,Sz_Tiezi b,Sz_User c where a.s_tid = b.s_tid and a.s_id = c.s_id order by s_id desc ) a group by tid ) a right join ( select distinct a.*,b.s_tid,b.s_head,b.s_text,b.s_date,b.s_jp,b.s_djl from Sz_User a,Sz_Tiezi b where a.s_id = b.s_id ) b on a.tid=b.s_tid group by s_tid ) a order by edate desc

select count(*) sl,b.* from (select s_htext,a.s_tid tid,s_name from HuiFu a,Sz_Tiezi b,Sz_User c where a.s_tid = b.s_tid and a.s_id = c.s_id) a right outer join (select distinct a.*,b.s_tid,b.s_head,b.s_text,b.s_date,b.s_jp,b.s_djl from Sz_User a,Sz_Tiezi b where a.s_id = b.s_id and b.s_jp = 1) b on a.tid=b.s_tid group by s_tid

select count(tid) sl,b.* from (select s_htext,a.s_tid tid,s_name from HuiFu a,Sz_Tiezi b,Sz_User c where a.s_tid = b.s_tid and a.s_id = c.s_id) a right join (select distinct a.*,b.s_tid,b.s_head,b.s_text,b.s_date,b.s_jp,b.s_djl from Sz_User a,Sz_Tiezi b where a.s_id = b.s_id) b on a.tid=b.s_tid group by s_tid order by sl desc

select count(tid) sl,b.* from (select s_htext,a.s_tid tid,s_name from HuiFu a,Sz_Tiezi b,Sz_User c where a.s_tid = b.s_tid and a.s_id = c.s_id) a right join (select distinct a.*,b.s_tid,b.s_head,b.s_text,b.s_date,b.s_jp,b.s_djl from Sz_User a,Sz_Tiezi b where a.s_id = b.s_id) b on a.tid=b.s_tid group by s_tid order by s_djl desc;

select b.*,count(a.s_ltext) s_hfl from (select * from HuiFuLzl) a right join (select distinct s_htext,a.s_tid,s_name,a.s_date,s_hid,s_txjpg from HuiFu a,Sz_Tiezi b,Sz_User c where a.s_tid = #{s_tid} and a.s_id = c.s_id) b on a.s_hid = b.s_hid group by s_hid order by s_hid
